issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
See eg https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3358009767

Introduced by ARROW-12980, test is failing with pandas 0.24 due to a pandas bug.

comments.body:
The bug in pandas was a difference in extracting the year from Index vs Series:

{code}
In [1]: pd.to_datetime(["1970-01-01T00:00:59.123456789"]).tz_localize("UTC").tz_convert("US/Central").year                                                                                                         
Out[1]: Int64Index([1969], dtype='int64')

In [2]: pd.to_datetime(["1970-01-01T00:00:59.123456789"]).tz_localize("UTC").tz_convert("US/Central").to_series().dt.year                                                                                          
Out[2]: 
1969-12-31 18:00:59.123456789-06:00    1970
dtype: int64
{code}

Fixed in pandas 1.0+ (we are using pandas as "reference" to compare the result with)
